participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: reflective and imaginative, with a hint of bitterness about lost time.
participant_1.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i am a 56 year old woman.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: caring and nurturing, with a strong sense of community.
participant_2.background: i have a dogs. i attend church every week. i'm a woman. i work as a school teacher.
